public static org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getLeftFace(org.bukkit.block.BlockFace relativeTo)

Parameters:
relativeTo - A block face
Returns:
The block face to the right when looking in the direction of the specified face.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - when the block face is BlockFace.UP, BlockFace.DOWN or BlockFace.SELF.
